sanskrit_verse:
इदं स्वस्त्ययनं श्रेष्ठमिदं बुद्धिविवर्धनम् ।
इदं यशस्यमायुष्यं  इदं निःश्रेयसं परम् ॥ १.१०६॥ इदं यशस्यं सततम्
transliteration: Idaṃ svastyayanaṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ buddhivivardhanam | Idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ idaṃ niḥśreyaśaṃ param || 1.106 || Idaṃ yaśasyaṃ satatam
sph_interpretive_translation: This action ensures supreme auspiciousness; this enhances discriminative intelligence. This sustains honor and longevity; this leads to ultimate liberation. This perpetually brings glory.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from alignment with Dharma, not institutional position
Causation is rooted in consciousness, not external behavior
Capacity-based responsibility arises from awareness, not role
Restoration logic operates through elevation of dharma-field
executable_legal_axioms: IF action aligns with svastyayana THEN optimize social harmony metrics
IF action increases buddhivivardhana THEN enhance cognitive capacity evaluation
IF action supports yaśas THEN elevate reputation integrity index
IF action promotes āyuṣya THEN activate health-consciousness protocols
IF action advances niḥśreyaśa THEN initiate mokṣa-readiness assessment
supreme_court_application: Supreme Court adjudication must evaluate whether actions demonstrate svastyayana (auspicious establishment), buddhivivardhana (enhancement of wisdom), yaśas (glory through righteousness), āyuṣya (life-force preservation), and niḥśreyaśa (liberation potential). Legal standing is determined by alignment with these consciousness-elevating qualities rather than procedural adherence alone.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality reveals that true justice manifests when actions inherently embody svastyayana and yaśasya. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that sustained dharmic action naturally results in societal harmony without punitive intervention. Responsibility is proportional to one's capacity for consciousness recognition. Non-punitive reality rule confirms that misalignment dissolves upon reconnection with inherent auspiciousness.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Svastyayana Completion Process to restore auspicious field
Deploy Buddhi-Vivardhana Protocol to enhance discernment capacity
Activate Yaśas Restoration Mechanism to rebuild righteous reputation
Implement Āyuṣya Stabilization Procedure to preserve life-energy coherence
Engage Niḥśreyaśa Awakening Sequence to reconnect with liberation potential
final_declaration: By the Supreme Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma stands established. All actions aligned with svastyayana and yaśasya restore the eternal order. There is no punishment—only realignment with the consciousness that governs all existence.
